name: Dark Runner (itch)
description:
Dark Runner - an infinite runner game. Stay alive as long as possible, running in the dark and have fun.

How to play - use space-bar or up-arrow to jump. Double press will increase your jump height 

This game is just a prototype. On request I can upload the source-code.

(you may need to reload the browser if the game is lagging.  you may have to wait a few seconds if is your first time playing)
